name: Block Wyvern
text:
2 Monsters, including an EARTH monster
You can also Summon this card by banishing 2 EARTH monsters from your GY. If this card is Summoned from the Extra Deck: Target 1 monster in your GY with the same Type or Attribute as a monster you control; Special Summon it. If this card is sent to the GY: Special Summon 1 "Block Dragon" from your deck ignoring summoning conditions.
